page.title: 15Reverend Hibbert of Ollerton
page.content: Reverend Hibbert is the{Church of {England}vicar for the parishes of Ollerton and Boughton. He has had this job for five years, previously being at a church in Mansfield. The churches under his control are St.Giles (in Ollerton Village),St. Paulinus (New Ollerton) and St.Matthews (Boughton).{Other places {for religion}in Ollerton include the Kingdom Hall, Pentecostal Church, Methodist Church and Roman Catholic Church. Reverend Hibbert explained that his work involves five main areas:1. Marriages,deaths and baptisms:2.Daily morning and evening services:3.Sunday services:4.Visiting sick or old people also parishioners with problems:5. Meeting with other clergymen. Of these, item 4 naturally occupies most of his time.
